i.name: Gathering Fire
i.description: Reduces Mantra's cooldown each time Karma damages an enemy champion with one of her abilities (Half-effect for Karma's basic attacks)

q.name: Inner Flame
q.description:
Karma sends forth a ball of spirit energy that explodes and deals damage upon hitting an enemy unit.

Mantra Bonus: In addition to the explosion, Mantra increases the destructive power of her Inner Flame, creating a cataclysm which deals damage after a short delay.

w.name: Focused Resolve
w.description:
Karma creates a tether between herself and a targeted enemy, dealing damage and revealing them. If the tether is not broken, the enemy will be rooted and damaged again.

Mantra Bonus: Karma strengthens the link, healing herself and extending the root duration.

e.name: Inspire
e.description:
Karma summons a protective shield that absorbs incoming damage and increases the Movement Speed of the protected ally.

Mantra Bonus: Energy radiates out from her target, strengthening the initial shield and applying Inspire to nearby allied champions.

r.name: Mantra
r.description: Karma empowers her next ability to do an additional effect. Mantra is available at level 1 and does not require a skill point.

i1.blurb: Reduces Mantra's cooldown each time Karma damages an enemy champion with one of her abilities (Half-effect for Karma's basic attacks)
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Karma''' {{sti|cooldown reduction|link=true|reduces}} {{ais|Mantra|Karma}} cooldown by {{pp|3|showtype=true|2 to 4|1 to 13}} seconds every time she [[damage]]s an enemy [[champion]] with an [[Champion ability|ability]], halved to {{pp|3|showtype=true|1 to 2|1 to 13}} seconds on her [[basic attack]]s.
i1.name: Gathering Fire
notes: * {{ai|Inner Flame|Karma}} / {{ai|Soulflare|Karma}} reduces {{ais|Mantra|Karma}} cooldown per target hit (for a total of {{pp|3|2*5 to 4*5|1 to 13|showtype=true}} seconds if 5 enemy champions are hit at once).
* {{ai|Focused Resolve|Karma}} / {{ai|Renewal|Karma}} reduces {{ais|Mantra|Karma}} cooldown per tick (for a total of {{pp|3|2*2 to 4*2|1 to 13|showtype=true}} seconds for the entire duration).
* {{ai|Inspire|Karma}} / {{ai|Defiance|Karma}} does not reduce {{ais|Mantra|Karma}} cooldown (it has no damage component).

riot.name: Gathering Fire
riot.description: Reduces Mantra's cooldown each time Karma damages an enemy champion with one of her abilities (Half-effect for Karma's basic attacks)

q1.blurb: Karma sends forth a ball of spirit energy that explodes and deals damage upon hitting an enemy unit. Mantra Bonus: In addition to the explosion, Mantra increases the destructive power of her Inner Flame, creating a cataclysm which deals damage after a short delay.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Karma''' fires a burst of spiritual energy in the target direction, detonating with the first enemy hit, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} all enemies around the target by 25% for {{ap|1.5}} seconds.
{{sbc|{{ai|Mantra|Karma}} - Soulflare:}} ''Inner Flame'' detonates upon hitting an enemy or reaching maximum range, dealing {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} in an increased area.
An area lingers around the detonation for {{fd|1.5}} seconds, {{tip|slow|slowing}} all enemies inside by 50%, after which it explodes, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies inside.
{{ai|Soulflare|Karma}} scales with {{ais|Mantra|Karma}} rank.
leveling: {{st|Detonation Damage|{{ai|Mantra|Karma|{{ap|35|140|245|350}}}} {{as|(+ 60% AP)}}|Total Bonus Damage|{{ai|Mantra|Karma|{{ap|60|215|370|525}}}} {{as|(+ 90% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|80|125|170|215|260}} (+ {{ai|Mantra|Karma|{{ap|60|215|370|525}}}}) {{as|(+ 150% AP)}}}}
q1.name: Inner Flame
notes: * {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the initial impact from either ability but will not block ''Soulflare's'' delayed damage.

riot.name: Inner Flame
riot.description:
Karma sends forth a ball of spirit energy that explodes and deals damage upon hitting an enemy unit.

Mantra Bonus: In addition to the explosion, Mantra increases the destructive power of her Inner Flame, creating a cataclysm which deals damage after a short delay.
riot.tooltip:
Fires a blast of energy that explodes upon enemy contact, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Mantra Bonus - Soulflare: Deals {{ f1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) additional magic damage and leaves a circle of flame that slows enemies by {{ f3 }}%. After 1.5 seconds the circle erupts, dealing {{ f2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the area.

q2.blurb: Karma sends forth a ball of spirit energy that explodes and deals damage upon hitting an enemy unit. Mantra Bonus: In addition to the explosion, Mantra increases the destructive power of her Inner Flame, creating a cataclysm which deals damage after a short delay.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Karma''' fires a burst of spiritual energy in the target direction, detonating with the first enemy hit, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} all enemies around the target by 25% for {{ap|1.5}} seconds.
{{sbc|{{ai|Mantra|Karma}} - Soulflare:}} ''Inner Flame'' detonates upon hitting an enemy or reaching maximum range, dealing {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} in an increased area.
An area lingers around the detonation for {{fd|1.5}} seconds, {{tip|slow|slowing}} all enemies inside by 50%, after which it explodes, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies inside.
{{ai|Soulflare|Karma}} scales with {{ais|Mantra|Karma}} rank.
leveling: {{st|Detonation Damage|{{ai|Mantra|Karma|{{ap|35|140|245|350}}}} {{as|(+ 60% AP)}}|Total Bonus Damage|{{ai|Mantra|Karma|{{ap|60|215|370|525}}}} {{as|(+ 90% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|80|125|170|215|260}} (+ {{ai|Mantra|Karma|{{ap|60|215|370|525}}}}) {{as|(+ 150% AP)}}}}
q2.name: Inner Flame
notes: * {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the initial impact from either ability but will not block ''Soulflare's'' delayed damage.

riot.name: Inner Flame
riot.description:
Karma sends forth a ball of spirit energy that explodes and deals damage upon hitting an enemy unit.

Mantra Bonus: In addition to the explosion, Mantra increases the destructive power of her Inner Flame, creating a cataclysm which deals damage after a short delay.
riot.tooltip:
Fires a blast of energy that explodes upon enemy contact, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Mantra Bonus - Soulflare: Deals {{ f1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) additional magic damage and leaves a circle of flame that slows enemies by {{ f3 }}%. After 1.5 seconds the circle erupts, dealing {{ f2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the area.

w1.blurb: Karma creates a tether between herself and a targeted enemy, dealing damage and revealing them. If the tether is not broken, the enemy will be rooted and damaged again. Mantra Bonus: Karma strengthens the link, healing herself and extending the root duration.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Karma''' exerts her will over a target enemy champion or [[monster]], dealing {{as|magic damage}} and forming a tether between them for up to 2 seconds, during which the target is {{tip|true sight|revealed}}.
If the tether holds for the duration, the target is dealt the same {{as|magic damage}} and is {{tip|root|rooted}} for a short duration.

{{sbc|{{ai|Mantra|Karma}} - Renewal:}} ''Focused Resolve's'' {{tip|root}} duration is increased, and {{tip|heal|heals}} '''Karma''' for {{sti|health|{{as|20% {{as|(+ 1% per 100 AP)}} of '''missing''' health}}}} on-cast and once more when the target {{tip|takedown|dies}} while tethered or is {{tip|root|rooted}}.
{{ai|Renewal|Karma}} scales with {{ais|Mantra|Karma}} rank.
leveling:
{{st|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|30*2 to 130*2}} {{as|(+ 90% AP)}}}}
{{st|Root Duration|{{ap|1.4 to 2}}}}
w1.name: Focused Resolve
notes: * {{tip|Spell shield}} will only block the tether's application, not the rooting from an already-applied one.

riot.name: Focused Resolve
riot.description:
Karma creates a tether between herself and a targeted enemy, dealing damage and revealing them. If the tether is not broken, the enemy will be rooted and damaged again.

Mantra Bonus: Karma strengthens the link, healing herself and extending the root duration.
riot.tooltip:
Links Karma to an enemy champion or monster, granting True Sight and dealing {{ effect1amount*0.5 }} (+{{ f4 }}) magic damage. If the link is unbroken for {{ e3 }} seconds, the target is rooted for {{ e2 }} second(s) and takes an additional {{ effect1amount*0.5 }} (+{{ f4 }}) magic damage.

Mantra Bonus - Renewal: Karma is healed for {{ f1 }}% (+{{ f3 }}%) of her missing health. If the link is not broken or the target dies, the root duration is increased by {{ f2 }} second(s) and Karma is healed for {{ f1 }}% (+{{ f3 }}%) of her missing health.

w2.blurb: Karma creates a tether between herself and a targeted enemy, dealing damage and revealing them. If the tether is not broken, the enemy will be rooted and damaged again. Mantra Bonus: Karma strengthens the link, healing herself and extending the root duration.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Karma''' exerts her will over a target enemy champion or [[monster]], dealing {{as|magic damage}} and forming a tether between them for up to 2 seconds, during which the target is {{tip|true sight|revealed}}.
If the tether holds for the duration, the target is dealt the same {{as|magic damage}} and is {{tip|root|rooted}} for a short duration.

{{sbc|{{ai|Mantra|Karma}} - Renewal:}} ''Focused Resolve's'' {{tip|root}} duration is increased, and {{tip|heal|heals}} '''Karma''' for {{sti|health|{{as|20% {{as|(+ 1% per 100 AP)}} of '''missing''' health}}}} on-cast and once more when the target {{tip|takedown|dies}} while tethered or is {{tip|root|rooted}}.
{{ai|Renewal|Karma}} scales with {{ais|Mantra|Karma}} rank.
leveling:
{{st|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|30*2 to 130*2}} {{as|(+ 90% AP)}}}}
{{st|Root Duration|{{ap|1.4 to 2}}}}
w2.name: Focused Resolve
notes: * {{tip|Spell shield}} will only block the tether's application, not the rooting from an already-applied one.

riot.name: Focused Resolve
riot.description:
Karma creates a tether between herself and a targeted enemy, dealing damage and revealing them. If the tether is not broken, the enemy will be rooted and damaged again.

Mantra Bonus: Karma strengthens the link, healing herself and extending the root duration.
riot.tooltip:
Links Karma to an enemy champion or monster, granting True Sight and dealing {{ effect1amount*0.5 }} (+{{ f4 }}) magic damage. If the link is unbroken for {{ e3 }} seconds, the target is rooted for {{ e2 }} second(s) and takes an additional {{ effect1amount*0.5 }} (+{{ f4 }}) magic damage.

Mantra Bonus - Renewal: Karma is healed for {{ f1 }}% (+{{ f3 }}%) of her missing health. If the link is not broken or the target dies, the root duration is increased by {{ f2 }} second(s) and Karma is healed for {{ f1 }}% (+{{ f3 }}%) of her missing health.

e1.blurb: Karma summons a protective shield that absorbs incoming damage and increases the Movement Speed of the protected ally. Mantra Bonus: Energy radiates out from her target, strengthening the initial shield and applying Inspire to nearby allied champions.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Karma''' {{tip|shield|shields}} the target allied [[champion]] or herself for {{fd|2.5}} seconds, granting them {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.

{{sbc|{{ai|Mantra|Karma}} - Defiance:}} ''Inspire's'' shield is increased. Allied champions near the target are shielded for 30% of the target's shield and gain the same {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}, both for their same durations.
{{ai|Defiance|Karma}} scales with {{ais|Mantra|Karma}} rank.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Shield|{{ai|Mantra|Karma|{{ap|30 to 210 4}}}} {{as|(+ 60% AP)}}|Total Target Shield|{{ap|70 to 170}} (+ {{ai|Mantra|Karma|{{ap|30 to 210 4}}}}) {{as|(+ 110% AP)}}|Allies' Shields|{{ap|70*0.3 to 170*0.3}} (+ {{ai|Mantra|Karma|{{ap|30*0.3 to 210*0.3 4}}}}) {{as|(+ 33% AP)}}}}
e1.name: Inspire
notes: * ''Inspire'' / ''Defiance'' has no cast time and does not interrupt ''Karma's'' previous orders.

riot.name: Inspire
riot.description:
Karma summons a protective shield that absorbs incoming damage and increases the Movement Speed of the protected ally.

Mantra Bonus: Energy radiates out from her target, strengthening the initial shield and applying Inspire to nearby allied champions.
riot.tooltip:
Target ally gains a shield, granting {{ e3 }}% Movement Speed for {{ e2 }} seconds and absorbing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Mantra Bonus - Defiance: The shield overflows with energy, absorbing an additional {{ f1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage. Nearby allied champions gain shields that absorb {{ f2 }}% as much as the initial target's shield. All champions shielded gain {{ f3 }}% movement speed for {{ e2 }} seconds.

e2.blurb: Karma summons a protective shield that absorbs incoming damage and increases the Movement Speed of the protected ally. Mantra Bonus: Energy radiates out from her target, strengthening the initial shield and applying Inspire to nearby allied champions.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Karma''' {{tip|shield|shields}} the target allied [[champion]] or herself for {{fd|2.5}} seconds, granting them {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.

{{sbc|{{ai|Mantra|Karma}} - Defiance:}} ''Inspire's'' shield is increased. Allied champions near the target are shielded for 30% of the target's shield and gain the same {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}, both for their same durations.
{{ai|Defiance|Karma}} scales with {{ais|Mantra|Karma}} rank.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Shield|{{ai|Mantra|Karma|{{ap|30 to 210 4}}}} {{as|(+ 60% AP)}}|Total Target Shield|{{ap|70 to 170}} (+ {{ai|Mantra|Karma|{{ap|30 to 210 4}}}}) {{as|(+ 110% AP)}}|Allies' Shields|{{ap|70*0.3 to 170*0.3}} (+ {{ai|Mantra|Karma|{{ap|30*0.3 to 210*0.3 4}}}}) {{as|(+ 33% AP)}}}}
e2.name: Inspire
notes: * ''Inspire'' / ''Defiance'' has no cast time and does not interrupt ''Karma's'' previous orders.

riot.name: Inspire
riot.description:
Karma summons a protective shield that absorbs incoming damage and increases the Movement Speed of the protected ally.

Mantra Bonus: Energy radiates out from her target, strengthening the initial shield and applying Inspire to nearby allied champions.
riot.tooltip:
Target ally gains a shield, granting {{ e3 }}% Movement Speed for {{ e2 }} seconds and absorbing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Mantra Bonus - Defiance: The shield overflows with energy, absorbing an additional {{ f1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage. Nearby allied champions gain shields that absorb {{ f2 }}% as much as the initial target's shield. All champions shielded gain {{ f3 }}% movement speed for {{ e2 }} seconds.

r1.blurb: Karma empowers her next ability to do an additional effect. Mantra is available at level 1 and does not require a skill point.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Karma''' empowers her next basic ability within 8 seconds for an additional effect.
'''Karma''' begins the game with one rank in ''Mantra''.
r1.name: Mantra
notes: * ''Mantra'' has no cast time, does not interrupt ''Karma's'' previous orders and can be used while [[Crowd control|crowd controlled]].
* ''Mantra's'' bonus effects are added on top of Karma's basic abilities.
* ''Mantra's'' cooldown begins on-cast, not when its effect is consumed.

riot.name: Mantra
riot.description: Karma empowers her next ability to do an additional effect. Mantra is available at level 1 and does not require a skill point.
riot.tooltip:
Karma empowers her next ability within 8 seconds for an additional effect.

Soulflare: Deals bonus damage and leaves behind a circle of flame, slowing enemies and dealing additional damage.

Renewal: Karma heals for a portion of her missing health. If the link is unbroken the root is longer and Karma is healed again.

Defiance: The shield is stronger and allied champions around the target also gain a shield and movement speed.
